original_text: But I have this against you, that you have abandoned the love you had at first.
korean_text: 그러나 너를 책망할 것이 있나니 너의 처음 사랑을 버렸느니라

sentences.original_text: But I have this against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 너를 책망할 것이 있으니

sentences.original_text: that you have abandoned the love you had at first.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 처음 가졌던 그 사랑을 버렸다는 것이다.
